verbs.description: The energy market [V: is] swinging wildly ahead of President Trump 's announcement on the fate of the Iran nuclear deal . Crude oil prices plunged as much as 4.4 % late Tuesday morning to $ 67.63 a barrel .

[ARG1: The energy market] is [V: swinging] [ARGM-MNR: wildly] [ARGM-TMP: ahead of President Trump 's announcement on the fate of the Iran nuclear deal] . Crude oil prices plunged as much as 4.4 % late Tuesday morning to $ 67.63 a barrel .

The energy market is swinging wildly ahead of President Trump 's announcement on the fate of the Iran nuclear deal . [ARG1: Crude oil prices] [V: plunged] [ARG2: as much as 4.4 %] [ARGM-TMP: late Tuesday morning] [ARG4: to $ 67.63 a barrel] .
